label: 清暑堂
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: One of the eight halls in the Buraku-in complex at the Greater Imperial Palace. Originally the site of sacred dances performed in conjunction with the great thanksgiving festival. The dances were later performed elsewhere but continued to be called Seishodō dances." [豊楽院]"
